document.full_text: the yankees' derek jeter, mariano rivera and jorge posada form the only trio of teammates to play 17 consecutive seasons with the same club.
document.title: as dh who can't hit, jorge posada may be punching ticket out of bronx
lines_and_colors: the yankees' derek jeter, mariano rivera and jorge posada form the only trio of teammates to play 17 consecutive seasons with the same club.
